::Lord Elder::

The shuttle pod from Cryonosis reaches the main land and opens it's main hatch. Elder steps out, taking in the sight. He hasn't been out of the Watcher base in some time.

Elder: Beast mode!

Elder transforms to his dog mode and runs off towards the battle at Relay.
